Standalone Server Help

How do I execute and evaluation?

curl -X POST -d "$(cat [DECLARATION_FILE])" -H "Content-Type:text/xml" localhost:[PORT]}/evaluation/evaluate

How do I obtain a list of the outputs generated?

curl -X GET localhost:[PORT]/evaluation/[PROJECT_ID]

How do I obtain an output file?

curl -o [FILE_NAME] -X GET localhost:[PORT]/evaluation/[PROJECT_ID]/[FILE_NAME]

How do I view evaluation logs?

In the server terminal, logging will printed associated with an executed evaluation.
